task.title: Bookmarking a Topic
task.shortdesc: How to add a topic to a collection

step.cmd: Open the topic you want to bookmark.
Select a folder to save the bookmark in:

choices.choice: To save the bookmark to an existing folder, click the name of the folder.
To save the bookmark to a new folder, type the name of the folder in the New folder box and click Create folder and add bookmark

step.stepresult: The bookmark appears in your chosen folder
